advjava.assessment1.zuul.refactored.cmds.builtin

Class QuitCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • advjava.assessment1.zuul.refactored.cmds.Command
      • advjava.assessment1.zuul.refactored.cmds.builtin.QuitCommand

  • public class QuitCommand
extends Command
    Used to quit the game, calls the game.terminate() method which sets a flag to end the game loop.
    Author:
    dja33
